physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Facial abnormalities included a triangular face, narrow bridge of the nose with a broad nose tip and big nostrils, low columella position, horizontal and broad mouth fold, thin vermilion, philtrum lower lip, deep-set eyes with antimongoloid slant, big low-set ears. Skeletal abnormalities included bilateral brachyphalangy of the thumb and shortening of the fourth and fifth toes. The proband exhibited a high-pitched voice and limited speech composed of simple words. Intellectual disability was evident.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Height SDS before GH treatment was -4.11, improving to -3.53 after the therapy. Initially significant growth delay observed at age 3, with height of 80.5 cm (SDS = -3.83) and height velocity of 4 cm/year (SDS = -2.93).
